title: SISTER ACT: Who is Amanda—and seriously, how does she know all the things?
description:
1. The Pod Squad is peeved that Glennon refers to Amanda as “Sister”—so what should we call her?
2. How Glennon and Amanda both spent their college weekends in jail—but for very different reasons.
3. Getting to know Amanda and her innate obsession with the link between our personal experience and our location within systems of power.
4. What’s making life a little easier for the Doyle sisters this week.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
